title: Creating an Equation
text: Supplementary angles add to 180, so we have $$x+y=180$$. We also know that $$x-3y=4$$ from the problem.

title: Elimination
text: We can multiply the first equation by 3. $$3x+3y=540$$. Now, we can add the equations to eliminiate y. $$4x=184$$

title: Solving for X, Y
text: $$x=\frac{184}{4}=46$$. Plugging x back in, we get $$y=135$$.
